scripts.install: cd packs/core && npm i && cd ../ui && npm i && cd ../crud && npm i && cd ../..
scripts.build: npm run linkall && cd packs/core && npm run build && cd ../ui && npm run build && cd ../crud && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.packall: cd packs/core && npm pack && cd ../ui && npm pack && cd ../crud && npm pack && cd ../..
scripts.test: cd packs/core && npm run test && cd ../..
